page.title: 12RECREATION 2.
page.content: { POISON.} Poison is played with ten players or less.Each player grabs a finger of the person who is "it"and he says,"I went to the shop and bought something beginning with" p"e.g.pencil,pineapple If poison is included in the list everyone runs away and "it"tries to catch them.When caught you lose one of your three lives. If three lives are lost you are out of the game. Once caught you stand with an arm against a wall until someone free runs under to free you. {45 BUST-OFF. This game can be played with any number of players and is very like Hide and Seek. When all run to hide you count to 45. If one is spotted you run to den and say"45 Bust-Off"and the player's name. He is now caught. The first person caught is "it".
